verses.verse: There was <WG2258> <WG99999> a man <WG444> of <WG1537> the Pharisees <WG5330>, named <WG3686> Nicodemus <WG846>, a ruler <WG758> of the Jews <WG2453>:

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Truly <WG281>, truly <WG281>, I say <WG3004> unto you <WG1437>, Unless <WG3361> a man <WG5100> is born <WG1080> again <WG509>, he can <WG1410> not <WG3756> see <WG1492> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>.

The wind <WG4151> blows <WG4154> where <WG3699> it wants <WG2309>, and <WG2532> you hear <WG191> the sound <WG5456> there <WG846>, but <WG235> can <WG1492> not <WG3756> tell <WG1492> from where <WG4159> it comes <WG2064>, and <WG2532> where <WG4226> it goes <WG5217>: so <WG3779> is <WG2076> every <WG3956> one that is born <WG1080> of <WG1537> the Spirit <WG4151>.
Nicodemus <WG3530> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, How <WG4459> can <WG1410> these things <WG5023> be <WG1096>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Are <WG1488> you <WG4771> a master <WG1320> of Israel <WG2474>, and <WG2532> know <WG1097> not <WG3756> these things <WG5023>?

Truly <WG281>, truly <WG281>, I say <WG3004> unto you <WG3754>, We speak <WG2980> of what <WG3739> we do know <WG1492>, and <WG2532> testify <WG3140> what <WG3739> we have seen <WG3708>; and <WG2532> you receive <WG2983> not <WG3756> our <WG2257> witness <WG3141>.

If <WG1487> I have told <WG2036> you <WG5213> earthly things <WG1919>, and <WG2532> you believe <WG4100> not <WG3756>, how <WG4459> shall you believe <WG4100>, if <WG1437> I tell <WG2036> you <WG5213> of heavenly things <WG2032>?

And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> has ascended up <WG305> to <WG1519> heaven <WG1487>, but <WG3361> he that <WG3588> came down <WG2597> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, even the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> which is <WG5607> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

He that believes <WG4100> on <WG1519> him <WG846> is <WG2919> not <WG3756> condemned <WG2919>: but <WG1161> he that believes <WG4100> not <WG3361> is condemned <WG2919> already <WG2235>, because <WG3754> he has <WG4100> not <WG3361> believed <WG4100> in <WG1519> the name <WG3686> of the only fathered <WG3439> Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> John <WG2491> also <WG2532> was <WG2258> baptizing <WG907> in <WG1722> Ænon <WG137> near <WG1451> to Salim <WG4530>, because <WG3754> there was <WG2258> much <WG4183> water <WG5204> there <WG1563>: and <WG2532> they came <WG3854>, and <WG2532> were baptized <WG907>.
For <WG1063> John <WG2491> was <WG2258> not yet <WG3768> cast <WG906> into <WG1519> prison <WG5438>.

And <WG2532> they came <WG2064> to <WG4314> John <WG2491>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, Rabbi <WG4461>, he <WG3739> that was <WG2258> with <WG3326> you <WG4675> beyond <WG4008> Jordan <WG2446>, to whom <WG3739> you <WG4771> bore witness <WG3140>, behold <WG1492>, the same <WG3778> baptizes <WG907>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> men come <WG2064> to <WG4314> him <WG846>.

John <WG2491> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, A man <WG444> <WG99999> can <WG1410> receive <WG2983> nothing <WG1437>, except <WG3361> it is <WG5600> given <WG1325> him <WG846> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>.

You <WG5210> yourselves <WG846> bear <WG3140> me <WG3427> witness <WG3140>, that <WG3754> I said <WG2036>, I <WG1473> am <WG1510> not <WG3756> the Christ <WG5547>, but <WG235> that <WG3754> I am <WG1510> sent <WG649> before <WG1715> him <WG1565>.

He <WG1565> must <WG1163> increase <WG837>, but <WG1161> I <WG1691> must decrease <WG1642>.

He that comes <WG2064> from above <WG509> is <WG2076> above <WG1883> all <WG3956>: he that is <WG5607> of <WG1537> the earth <WG1093> is <WG2076> <WG99999> earthly <WG1093>, and <WG2532> speaks <WG2980> of <WG1537> the earth <WG1093>: he that comes <WG2064> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> is <WG2076> above <WG1883> all <WG3956>.

He that has received <WG2983> his <WG846> testimony <WG3141> has set to his seal <WG4972> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> true <WG227>.
